}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR3L) *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *16Gbps switching capacity
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_gs308t_1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
